alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Forsyth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:49AM EST until January 10 at 5:14AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River at Canton affecting Cherokee County. Etowah River at GA 9 near Dawsonville affecting Forsyth and Dawson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River Downstream I-575 at Canton affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Etowah River at GA 9 near Dawsonville. * WHEN...Until early this morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding of Nicholson Road in northwest Forsyth county begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.4 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 10/30/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued at 300 PM EST.early this morning at 515 AM EST.
